Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project CodeBook
=================================================
This file describes the data sources and files to transform and clean the data.  
* The site where the data was obtained:  
http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones      
The data for the project:  
https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip  
* The run_analysis.R script performs the cleaning and transformations necessary to obtain the resutting tidy dataset. All the sreps are described in the script file
* The resulting file is tidytest.csv
